But really when a guy is throwing touchdown passes and winning games, you don't notice all that[ negative] stuff. Fran Tarkenton talked about how difficult it could be for Jay Cutler to change the perception of those around the league. But Jay Cutler only has to do what Ben Roethlisberger and Michael Vick did to recover from their scandals- win.

Senator Kirsten Gillibrand will serve on the Senate Armed Services Committee. Kirsten Gillibrand had served on the House Armed Services Committee, and after being appointed to the Senate, she worked on military issues including the repeal of Don't Ask, Don't Tell.
